actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Proposes that: (1) equality of rights under the law shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or by any State on account of sex; and (2) reproductive rights for women under the law shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or any State.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.
